title: FS/FT: Wilhelm EPDG SGC 55, other EPDGs, couple others too.
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS/FT: Wilhelm EPDG SGC 55, other EPDGs, couple others too.
posts.post_content:
And the dupes keep coming. Have a bunch of lower grade EPDGs on eBay now too, with the crazier prices. My seller account is the same handle.....thromdog.


As for below, looking to sell these or trade them for upgrades or EPDGs. Let me know what you got.  As always, I will entertain offers, especially if buying a couple.  

If you have any EPDG's that I don't have please let me know. My collage of current EPDG's I own is below, so if you don't see it in there.....I need it.

"I'll take it" takes precedence over negotiations.  I will ship with tracking and would like payment via PP F&F.



[STRIKE]$185[/STRIKE] $165 Wilhelm EPDG
[STRIKE]$55[/STRIKE] $47 George Davis
[STRIKE]$35[/STRIKE] $30 Bill Dahlen Sovereign....crazy but hard to come by.
$SOLD Mordecai Brown Portrait EPDG.
$SOLD Ed Willetts EPDG 
$SOLD Chase Dark Cap
$SOLD Molly Miller PSA 2
$SOLD  McQuillan batting SGC 80
